name: retrieve_collections
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool openblur.
Tool description: Unofficial Listings API for blur.io

- For Blur V1 endpoints use this API: https://rapidapi.com/openseatools/api/opensea15

- Crypto Payments Available

- Lifetime Unlimited Requests Licenses Available

- Private Plans with 16 / 32 / 64 / 128  requests/second Available

- Ready made bots written in node.js already configured to work with RapidApi Available.

Join our Discord to inquire & find out the latest information and tools: 

https://discord.gg/Yezs2VDhBV
API description: Retrieve collections from the Blur API based on given criteria.

pagesize.description: Number of records per page. If not specified, the default is None.

is_from.description: Starting point of the records. If not specified, the default is None.

slug.description: Slug identifier for the collection. If not specified, the default is None.

contractaddress.description: Contract address of the collection. If not specified, the default is None.

orderby.description: Order in which results are returned. Either 'asc' or 'desc'. Default is 'desc'.

sortby.description: Field by which to sort results. Options include 'floorPrice', 'floorPriceOneDay', 'floorPriceOneWeek', 'volumeFifteenMinutes', 'volumeOneDay', 'volumeOneWeek', 'bestCollectionBid', 'totalCollectionBidValue', 'totalSupply', 'numberOwners'. Default is 'volumeOneDay'.
